info_zh.description: 以自然步道為主題，整合政府開放數據和會員CRUD功能，提供多樣檢索與瀏覽，藉由JSON格式轉換實現收藏、評價，以及個人化分析圖表。

info_en.description: This platform is about nature trails. It uses government data and provides member CRUD functionality. You can search and browse in many ways. It also helps registered members save, rate, review, and view personal charts through JSON format conversion.

info_zh.description: 選票查詢與分析平台，利用中選會的真實選票數據和模擬候選人，通過多種圖表和視角深入分析選票。

info_en.description: This voting query and analysis platform uses real voting data from the government and simulated candidates, giving detailed analysis through different charts and views.

info_zh.description: 博物館藏品經數位化後，利用資料庫檢索與瀏覽功能提升應用性。原始數據從通用資料庫提取，經管理者後台彙整與重新編輯後，提供使用者瀏覽與查詢。
info_zh.nature: 公司內外部合作開發的正式產品
info_zh.task: 規劃實物數位化流程與資料庫功能、Metadata欄位與著錄內容的撰寫規則，與後續應用推廣企劃

info_en.description: After turning museum collections into digital metadata, it’s easier to search and browse using the database. The data is from a general database, organized and edited by the manager, and then available for users to browse and search.
info_en.nature: Official product developed through internal and external collaboration
info_en.task: Planning the digitization of physical collections, setting rules for metadata and catalog content, and promoting the application.
